statements: SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling;
SELECT id, date FROM plastic_recycling WHERE total_bottles > 100;
SELECT recycled_bottles, total_bottles FROM plastic_recycling WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, SUM(recycled_bottles) AS total_recycled_bottles FROM plastic_recycling GROUP BY id;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling WHERE total_bottles > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, recycled_bottles ASC
SELECT SUM(total_bottles) AS total_bottles_sum, AVG(recycled_bottles) AS recycled_bottles_avg FROM plastic_recycling WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, total_bottles, recycled_bottles FROM plastic_recycling WHERE total_bottles > recycled_bottles ORDER BY total_bottles DESC
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY recycled_bottles DESC
SELECT AVG(total_bottles) AS total_bottles_avg, MAX(recycled_bottles) AS max_recycled_bottles FROM plastic_recycling WHERE date < '2022-07-01'
SELECT * FROM PlasticBottles;
SELECT bottle_id, recycling_status FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycling_status = 'Recycled';
SELECT * FROM RecyclingStatistics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stats_id, recycled_count, landfill_count FROM RecyclingStatistics WHERE recycled_count > landfill_count;
SELECT bottle_id, recycling_status, weight_kg FROM PlasticBottles WHERE weight_kg > 1.5 ORDER BY weight_kg DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycling_status = 'Recycled';
SELECT bottle_id, recycling_status FROM PlasticBottles WHERE weight_kg > 1.5 ORDER BY bottle_id DESC;
SELECT SUM(recycled_count) AS total_recycled, SUM(landfill_count) AS total_landfill FROM RecyclingStatistics WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT bottle_id, recycling_status, weight_kg FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycling_status <> 'Landfill' ORDER BY weight_kg ASC;
SELECT bottle_id, weight_kg FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycling_status LIKE '%Recycled%' AND weight_kg BETWEEN 0.5 AND 2.0 ORDER BY bottle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlasticBottles;
SELECT bottle_id, brand, recycled FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycled = TRUE;
SELECT brand, recycled FROM PlasticBottles WHERE bottle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenters ORDER BY total_bottles_recycled DESC;
SELECT location, total_bottles_received FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE center_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycled = True;
SELECT brand, landfill FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycled = False;
SELECT location, total_bottles_recycled FROM RecyclingCenters ORDER BY total_bottles_recycled DESC;
SELECT landfill_id, location FROM Landfills WHERE bottles_received > 1000;
SELECT brand, recycled, landfill FROM PlasticBottles WHERE brand LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY recycled ASC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_bottles;
SELECT bottle_type, recycle_status FROM plastic_bottles;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites WHERE landfill_capacity > 5000;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT center_name, center_location FROM recycling_centers WHERE center_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, bottle_type, recycle_status FROM plastic_bottles;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites WHERE landfill_capacity > 10000;
SELECT center_name, center_location FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY center_id DESC;
SELECT bottle_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM plastic_bottles GROUP BY bottle_type HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT site_name, landfill_capacity, COUNT(*) AS total_bottles FROM landfill_sites JOIN plastic_bottles ON site_id = id GROUP BY site_name, landfill_capacity ORDER BY total_bottles DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastics;
SELECT id, bottle_type FROM plastics WHERE weight > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT location FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, date, quantity FROM recycling_records WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM plastics WHERE recycled = TRUE;
SELECT bottle_type, weight FROM plastics WHERE bottle_type = 'PET';
SELECT location, capacity FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT plastic_id, date FROM recycling_records WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT landfill_id, quantity FROM landfill_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
